example.eg: The toilet had a very loud flush; whenever someone got up to use it at night it woke up the entire house.
example.egtrans: 那个马桶冲水的声音很大。每次有人起夜上厕所，整个房子的人都会被吵醒。

example.eg: A good toilet should be able to clear just about anything with one flush.
example.egtrans: 一个好的冲水马桶应该一次冲水就能把所有脏污都冲干净。

example.eg: You could see Tom was embarrassed from the flush spreading over his face.
example.egtrans: 从他满脸的潮红你也可以看出，汤姆非常不好意思。

example.eg: Amy won the game with a flush.
The toilet won't flush. We'll have to call a plumber.
example.egtrans: 那个马桶冲不了水。我们必须叫个水管工来。

example.eg: You used the toilet - good boy. Did you remember to flush?
example.egtrans: 你自己上厕所了，好孩子！你有记得冲马桶吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 冲厕所, 冲水, 冲马桶

example.eg: Don't flush too much paper down the toilet, you will block it!
example.egtrans: 别丢太多纸到马桶里并冲下去，会造成马桶堵塞的！

example.eg: Roz flushed when Paul paid her a compliment.
example.egtrans: 保罗夸她的时候，罗兹的脸红了。

example.eg: Tommy's cheeks flushed when the teacher told him he was a good boy.
example.egtrans: 老师说汤米是个好孩子的时候，汤米的脸红了。

example.eg: The hooks should be flush with the wall, otherwise the pictures will not hang properly.
example.egtrans: 挂钩应该和墙面平齐，否则画就挂不正。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 丰足的, 充裕的, 大量的

example.eg: I'm feeling flush. Let me buy you all a drink!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 富有的, 富足的, 有钱的

example.eg: The kitchen fitter made sure the two work surfaces were flush.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 齐平的, 在同一平面的

example.eg: Rose hit Paul flush on the chin and he went flying backwards.
Check that the cupboard doors close flush once you have fitted the hinges.

dsense.name: flush [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (drive bird or animal out of hiding)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...从隐藏处驱赶出来，把...赶出

example.eg: The vet gave the dog laxatives to flush the toxin from his system.
The drug dealer heard the police at the door and quickly ran to the bathroom to flush away the evidence.
They had to flush out the sewer pipe to make it drain properly.
Drinking lots of water helps to flush out toxins.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迫使...离开藏身处, 驱赶出来

example.eg: Our dog had flushed a deer out of the woods and into the open field.
Please flush the toilet after you've used it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 冲马桶, 冲厕所, 冲水

dsense.name: hot flash (US), hot flush (UK)
dsense.guideword: often plural (heat: symptom of menopause) (身体症状)

example.eg: The hot flash I had yesterday made me feel feverish, dizzy and tired.

dsense.name: pour-flush
dsense.guideword: (toilet: flushed by pouring water in) (马桶)
